### IConsole.SwapBuffer method
</br>


#### Attempts to switch to a target screen buffer.

```csharp
public bool SwapBuffer(TargetScreen value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | Target buffer. |

### Return Value

`true` if the switch succeeded; otherwise `false`.
